JUDGES: Christos Rozakis;Dean Spielmann;George Nicolaou;Giorgio Malinverni;Khanlar Hajiyev;Sverre Erik Jebens
TEXT: The applicant , PERSON , is a NORP national who was born in DATE and lives in Split . She is represented before the ORG by Mr O. Roje , a lawyer practising in ORG . ORG ( “ the Government ” ) are represented by their Agent , PERSON .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .

On DATE the applicant brought a civil action against her employer , company D .- V. d.d . , in ORG ( PERSON ) , seeking payment of her salary arrears and that the defendant be ordered to pay the mandatory contributions to the relevant funds . She also applied for an interim measure ( privremena mjera ) to secure the payment .

In the period before the entry into force of the LAW in respect of GPE ( DATE ) , the court held several hearings , and a financial expert report was drawn up . The applicant was absolved from bearing the costs of proceedings .

On DATE the applicant brought another civil action in ORG against the company NORP d.d , , which was the sole shareholder of her employer . Her claim was the same as the one in the proceedings instituted in DATE .
On DATE ORG joined these CARDINAL sets of proceedings .

At a hearing held on DATE the ORG gave a judgment , accepting in part the applicant ’s claim for the payment of her salary arrears . It declared the part of the applicant ’s claim that the defendants be ordered to pay the mandatory contributions inadmissible for lack of jurisdiction . It also dismissed the applicant ’s request for an interim measure .
On DATE the defendants lodged an appeal against the above judgment . The applicant lodged an appeal on DATE , and the case - file was forwarded to ORG ( PERSON ) .
On DATE the ORG ( PERSON ) opened bankruptcy proceedings against company D .- V. d.d . The applicant subsequently submitted her claims in the bankruptcy proceedings .
On CARDINAL DATE the applicant lodged a constitutional complaint with ORG ( Ustavni sud PERSON ) , complaining about the length of civil proceedings pending before ORG .

On DATE the ORG stayed the proceedings against company D .- V. d.d . , since the bankruptcy proceedings had meanwhile been opened against it . As to the claim against company NORP d.d . , it upheld the first - instance judgment as regards the applicant ’s salary arrears , and quashed the decision on lack of jurisdiction as regards the remaining applicant ’s claims . Thus the decision concerning the applicant ’s salary arrears became final and as to the remainder of the applicant ’s claim the case was remitted to the first - instance court .

Following the constitutional complaint by the applicant , on DATE ORG found a violation of the applicant ’s right to a hearing within a reasonable time . It awarded the applicant a sum of CARDINAL NORP kunas ( HRK ) , and also ordered ORG to decide the case in the shortest time possible but DATE after the publication of the decision of ORG in ORG .
ORG decision was published in ORG of DATE , and the DATE period expired on CARDINAL DATE .

On DATE the applicant lodged a fresh complaint about the length of proceedings with ORG . On DATE that court found a violation of the applicant ’s right to a hearing within a reasonable time for the period after the LAW court ’s decision . It awarded the applicant a sum of HRK CARDINAL and also ordered ORG to decide the case in the shortest time possible but DATE form the receipt of the case file at that court . The case file was returned to ORG on DATE .
At the hearing held on DATE the applicant withdrew her claim and sought only the costs of the proceedings .
On DATE ORG terminated the proceedings on the ground that the applicant had withdrawn her claim and awarded the applicant the costs of the proceedings . Thus the proceedings were finally concluded .
